about_one: Hello! My name is M. Robi, a self-taught Front-end Developer with a passion for creating digital experiences. My journey into web development kicked off in November 2020 when I started learning about Digital Marketing and quickly discovered a passion for coding.
about_two: I've learned a lot from online resources like FreeCodeCamp, YouTube, and Stack Overflow, gaining skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks.
about_three: Currently, I'm focused on advancing my career in Web Development. I'm excited about the future and eager to continue growing and improving in this field.
experience_one: I specialize in creating responsive, high-performance websites that are both professional and easy to use. My expertise is in front-end development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I have experience building small to medium-sized web applications, always trying to adhere to best practices to ensure quality and efficiency.
experience_two: Visit my LinkedIn profile for more details, or feel free to contact me directly.
experience_three: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently
experience_four: and several more that I am interested in learning
work_one: Yippy is an end-to-end corporate gifting solution for your company. For more than 2 years, I was responsible for changing the design to a mobile-responsive web, implementing SEO for organic traffic, improving performance and Core Web Vitals, and creating the Yippy dashboard, which I cannot include in this portfolio.
work_two: During my time at Yippy, I dedicated myself fully to my work and, although I didn’t pursue personal projects outside of office hours, I’m excited to share my passion and creativity through my first portfolio, which I developed about two years ago. I believe it showcases my skills and potential perfectly for this opportunity!
contact_one: I’m always open to new opportunities and would love to hear from you. Whether you have a question or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out. I’ll do my best to get back to you
